column1: Little Goat Diner////Me and my friend happened upon The Little Goat diner
column2: when we were planning on going to Au Cheval
column3: but realized the wait was 3+ hours
column5: so we needed to find somewhere else to eat in the area
column6: since it's a little bit from Downtown
column7: just meaning you can't walk back into the city. So we walked down the street and this looked cute and the prices were very reasonable. We both got burgers which were great
column9: the one I ordered reminded me of an upscale In'n'out
column10: which is always a good option! Don't forget to take pics in the photo booth inside!
